subject: Re: This Is Not Joke
body:
Attention Mr. Lewis D

Good Morning

Sir How Many Times Will I Tell You  That Your  Fund Instruction Was 
Giving To Me By Top Government Officials And The New President Saying 
That Your Name Is Among The Five Beneficiary That Will Receive Their 
Contract Inheritance Fund Sum Of $40 Million And Please This Inheritance 
Fund And I Believe That You Inheritance The Funds From Family That Is 
Why The Top Official Choose Your Name....This Funds Is 100% Real. Anyway 
The Amount Is us$40 Million And Is Ready To Wire In Your Account As Soon 
As You Comply

(2) The Reason Why You Are Ask To Provide Your Account Details Is For 
The Transfer Of Your $40 Million And Please We Are Not Here For Playing 
And I Am A Very Busy Person

Provide Your Account Details Now So That We Can Start Processing Your 
Fund Transfer And Like I Said Noting Is Going To Happen To Your Account 
And Is Safe Here

Please Proceed And Forward The Information Below To Enable Us Complete 
The Fund Transfer

CAN YOU CALL ME ON MY PHONE?

Note That You Are Required To Designate Correctly Your Banking 
Information To Enable Me Start Processing Your Fund Transfer Now

Your Banking Details Required Is Such As.

Bank Name :
Bank Address :
Bank Account No:
Bank Routing Or Swift Code No:
Bank Account Holder Name:
Bank Telephone No:
Thanks
Mr.Adebayo Adelabu
Deputy Governor Central Bank Of Nigeria(CBN)

subject: Re: Attention Mr. Lewis D
body:
Attention Mr. Lewis D

Good Morning

Sir I Have Sent You Message Many Times But No Responding From 
You..Anyway We Can Not Wait For You Anymore And This Morning Your $40 
Million Has Been Cancel And Please You Are Advise To Open The Attachment 
Of This Message And Sign The Cancellation Letter And Return It Back To 
Me So That We Will Return The $40 Million To The Government Account  
Since You Are Not Interested Again

But If You Are 100% Willing To Receive The $40 Million Then Forward Your 
Account Details To Us Now

CAN YOU CALL ME ON MY PHONE?

Note That You Are Required To Designate Correctly Your Banking 
Information To Enable Me Start Processing Your Fund Transfer Now

Your Banking Details Required Is Such As.

Bank Name :
Bank Address :
Bank Account No:
Bank Routing Or Swift Code No:
Bank Account Holder Name:
Bank Telephone No:

OPEN THE ATTACHMENT AND READ THE CANCELLATION LETTER AND SIGN IT NOW
Thanks
Mr.Adebayo Adelabu
Deputy Governor Central Bank Of Nigeria(CBN)

subject: Re: Sir Should I Submit Your File Number?
body:
ATTENTION Mr.Lewis

This Is To Inform You That The New President Has Ordered The Central 
Bank of Nigeria Headquarters To Move To Lagos State And Also He Ordered 
Us To Summit beneficiaries Transfer File Numbers That Not Claim Their 
$40 Million Within 24 Hours...Sir Should I Submit Your File Number? 
Because As We Are Moving Our Headquarters To Lagos That We Will Not 
In-charge Of Your Funds Again

But I Guarantee You 100% That If You Can Make The Payment Of $900.00 
Today Or Tomorrow Then I Will Push Your $40 Million To Your Account 
Without Delaying And No Office We Ever Ask You To Pay Another Fee..If 
You Are Willing To Make The Payment Then Let Me Know

And If You Are Not Interested In Paying The Fee Then Let Me Know So That 
I Will Submit Your Fine Number To The Government Today.....Sir I Am 100% 
Willing To Work With You And Get Your Transfer Completed
Thanks
Mr. Adebayo Adelabuy
Deputy Governor Central Bank Of Nigeria(CBN)

subject: Re: Reference Transfer File number HBL07192022TIX
body:
ATTENTION Mr.Lewis D

Sir Thank You Very Much For Your Time And Everything And Also I Promise 
Never To Contact You Again..Anyway Like You Said That You Are Not 
Interested In Receiving The $40 Million Anymore No Problem Sir

Sir I Will Be Submitting Your Reference Transfer File number 
HBL07192022TIX And INVOICE ID Number: B9T4631171989AJ-992072 To The 
Office Of The Senate Tomorrow Morning So That They We Cancel The $40 
Million And Return The Fund To The Government And Also From Tomorrow We 
Will Not Handling Your Fund Transfer File Again Because We Are Moving To 
State And That Is Where Our Headquarters Will Be..It Is An Order From 
The New President

But If You Are Still Interested To Have Your $40 Million Then Contact Me 
Now And Also Make The Payment Of $810.00 Today
Thanks
Mr. Adebayo Adelabuy
Deputy Governor Central Bank Of Nigeria(CBN)

subject: Re: Sir Your Name Is Out On The News Papers Today
body:
ATTENTION Mr.Lewis D

Sir Your Name Is Out On The News Papers Today And Please You Are Advise 
To Read The Cancellation And Sign It...I Can,t Believe You Are Losing 
Your $40 Million Just Because Of $650.00
Thanks
Mr. Adebayo Adelabuy
Deputy Governor Central Bank Of Nigeria(CBN)
